DOC.criteria: apparently healthy recreationally active man woman age 18 40 ; need least six month immediate prior history resistance training bench press leg press squat ; history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmia and/or cardiovascular disease ; currently use prescription medication ; intolerance caffeine and/or natural stimulant ; pregnant lactate female plan become pregnant next month ; history smoking ; drink excessively ( i.e. , 12 drink per week ) ;
